required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Dabigatran Etexilate in Patients With Mechanical Heart Valves
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomised, Phase II Study to Evaluate the sAfety and Pharmacokinetics of oraL dabIGatran Etexilate in Patients After Heart Valve replacemeNt

brief_summary.textblock: To validate the dosing algorithm for dabigatran etexilate in patients receiving a mechanical heart valve.

primary_outcome.measure: Comparison of Observed and Predicted Trough Dabigatran Plasma Concentrations at Steady State (C Trough,ss) at Week 1
primary_outcome.description: Comparisons between dabigatran trough plasma levels as predicted by simulations to those observed in the study are performed to validate the dosing algorithm for Dabigatran Etexilate (DE) . Despite the primary endpoint only being assessed in patients who received dabigatran etexilate, Warfarin was included as a comparator treatment in this study in order to facilitate informal comparisons of outcome events, and to look for efficacy signals in this previously unexplored population.

primary_outcome.measure: Comparison of Observed and Predicted Trough Dabigatran Plasma Concentrations (C Trough,ss) at Week 2
primary_outcome.description: Comparisons between dabigatran trough plasma levels as predicted by simulations to those observed in the study are performed to validate the dosing algorithm for Dabigatran Etexilate (DE). Despite the primary endpoint only being assessed in patients who received dabigatran etexilate, Warfarin was included as a comparator treatment in this study in order to facilitate informal comparisons of outcome events, and to look for efficacy signals in this previously unexplored population.

primary_outcome.measure: Comparison of Observed and Predicted Trough Dabigatran Plasma Concentrations (C Trough,ss) at Week 4
primary_outcome.description: Comparisons between dabigatran trough plasma levels as predicted by simulations to those observed in the study are performed to validate the dosing algorithm for Dabigatran Etexilate (DE). Despite the primary endpoint only being assessed in patients who received dabigatran etexilate, Warfarin was included as a comparator treatment in this study in order to facilitate informal comparisons of outcome events, and to look for efficacy signals in this previously unexplored population.

primary_outcome.measure: Comparison of Observed and Predicted Trough Dabigatran Plasma Concentrations (C Trough,ss) at End of Trial (EoT) at Week 12
primary_outcome.description: Comparisons between dabigatran trough plasma levels as predicted by simulations to those observed in the study are performed to validate the dosing algorithm for Dabigatran Etexilate (DE). (As the trial was stopped prematurely, EOT may not be 12 weeks after randomisation for most of the patients) Despite the primary endpoint only being assessed in patients who received dabigatran etexilate, Warfarin was included as a comparator treatment in this study in order to facilitate informal comparisons of outcome events, and to look for efficacy signals in this previously unexplored population.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Patients With Observed Trough Dabigatran Plasma Concentrations < 50 ng/mL at Week 1
secondary_outcome.description: Percentage of patients with observed Ctrough,ss value < 50 ng/mL are presented. This outcome measure was only analysed for all patients together and not by dose group.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Patients With Observed Trough Dabigatran Plasma Concentrations < 50 ng/mL at Week 2
secondary_outcome.description: Percentage of patients with observed Ctrough,ss value < 50 ng/mL are presented. This outcome measure was only analysed for all patients together and not by dose group.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Patients With Observed Trough Dabigatran Plasma Concentrations < 50 ng/mL at Week 4
secondary_outcome.description: Percentage of patients with observed Ctrough,ss value < 50 ng/mL are presented. This outcome measure was only analysed for all patients together and not by dose group.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Patients With Observed Trough Dabigatran Plasma Concentrations < 50 ng/mL at End of Trial (EoT) Week 12
secondary_outcome.description: Percentage of patients with observed Ctrough,ss value < 50 ng/mL (As the trial was stopped prematurely, EOT may not be 12 weeks after randomisation for most of the patients) This outcome measure was only analysed for all patients together and not by dose group.

arm_group.description: Patient dose dependent on screening CrCl levels and TT
warfarin doses to maintain INR levels

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion criteria:
1. Patients aged 18-75
2. Patients who have received a bileaflet mechanical heart valve
Exclusion criteria:
1. Prior valve surgery
2. Uncontrolled hypertension
3. severe renal impairment
4. active liver disease
5. increased risk of bleeding

group.title: Dabigatran Etexilate (DE)
group.description: Oral administration of 1 capsule of 150 mg (150 mg), 2 capsules of 110 mg (220 mg), or 2 capsules of 150 mg (300 mg) twice daily

group.title: Warfarin
group.description: Oral administration of Warfarin 1mg, 3mg and 5 mg according to target international normalised ratio (INR), as recommended in guidelines, and deemed appropriate by investigator

baseline.population: Treated Set (TRT): The set of patients who received at least 1 dose of study medication

group.title: Dabigatran Etexilate (DE)
group.description: Oral administration of 1 capsule of 150 mg (150 mg), 2 capsules of 110 mg (220 mg), or 2 capsules of 150 mg (300 mg) twice daily

group.title: Warfarin
group.description: Oral administration of Warfarin 1mg, 3mg and 5 mg according to target international normalised ratio (INR), as recommended in guidelines, and deemed appropriate by investigator

outcome.title: Comparison of Observed and Predicted Trough Dabigatran Plasma Concentrations at Steady State (C Trough,ss) at Week 1
outcome.description: Comparisons between dabigatran trough plasma levels as predicted by simulations to those observed in the study are performed to validate the dosing algorithm for Dabigatran Etexilate (DE) . Despite the primary endpoint only being assessed in patients who received dabigatran etexilate, Warfarin was included as a comparator treatment in this study in order to facilitate informal comparisons of outcome events, and to look for efficacy signals in this previously unexplored population.
outcome.population: Pharmacokinetic set (PKS):Patients were included in the PKS if they were treated with DE, had at least 1 evaluable C trough,ss value and had a non-missing value for gender, age and Creatinine clearance(CrCl) level. Patients who had any important Protocol Violations that may have affected PK data were excluded from the PKS.

group.title: Observed
group.description: This includes the observed Ctrough,ss value for all patients in the pharmacokinetic set (PKS) who have a corresponding predicted value.

group.title: Predicted
group.description: This includes the predicted Ctrough,ss value for all patients in the PKS who have a corresponding observed value.

measure.title: Comparison of Observed and Predicted Trough Dabigatran Plasma Concentrations at Steady State (C Trough,ss) at Week 1
measure.description: Comparisons between dabigatran trough plasma levels as predicted by simulations to those observed in the study are performed to validate the dosing algorithm for Dabigatran Etexilate (DE) . Despite the primary endpoint only being assessed in patients who received dabigatran etexilate, Warfarin was included as a comparator treatment in this study in order to facilitate informal comparisons of outcome events, and to look for efficacy signals in this previously unexplored population.
measure.population: Pharmacokinetic set (PKS):Patients were included in the PKS if they were treated with DE, had at least 1 evaluable C trough,ss value and had a non-missing value for gender, age and Creatinine clearance(CrCl) level. Patients who had any important Protocol Violations that may have affected PK data were excluded from the PKS.

analysis.groups_desc: Null hypothesis: "The difference of the population average responses was either ≤ to the lower bound or ≥ to the upper bound of the acceptance range" . Alternative hypothesis: "The difference of the population average responses was both > than the lower bound and < than the upper bound of the acceptance range" [Note: The acceptance range for the geometric mean is 80-125%]
analysis.estimate_desc: The standard error of the mean is actually the geometric standard error. (Observed vs Predicted)

outcome.title: Percentage of Patients With Observed Trough Dabigatran Plasma Concentrations < 50 ng/mL at Week 1
outcome.description: Percentage of patients with observed Ctrough,ss value < 50 ng/mL are presented. This outcome measure was only analysed for all patients together and not by dose group.
outcome.population: Pharmacokinetic set (PKS):Patients were included in the PKS if they were treated with DE, had at least 1 evaluable C trough,ss value and had a non-missing value for gender, age and Creatinine clearance(CrCl) level. Patients who had any important Protocol Violations that may have affected PK data were excluded from the PKS.

group.title: Patients Evaluated
group.description: All patients treated orally with either 150mg, 220mg or 300mg of dabigatran etexilate (DE) twice daily.

measure.title: Percentage of Patients With Observed Trough Dabigatran Plasma Concentrations < 50 ng/mL at Week 1
measure.description: Percentage of patients with observed Ctrough,ss value < 50 ng/mL are presented. This outcome measure was only analysed for all patients together and not by dose group.
measure.population: Pharmacokinetic set (PKS):Patients were included in the PKS if they were treated with DE, had at least 1 evaluable C trough,ss value and had a non-missing value for gender, age and Creatinine clearance(CrCl) level. Patients who had any important Protocol Violations that may have affected PK data were excluded from the PKS.

analysis.p_value_desc: Probability that P remains < 10% are presented, where P=Percentage of patients with observed Ctrough,ss value < 50 ng/mL
analysis.method_desc: Probability calculated using Beta function ~B(1 + r, 1 + n - r),r=no. of patients(observed Ctrough,ss value < 50 ng/mL), n=no. of patients evaluated

reported_events.time_frame: From first intake of study drug until last intake of study drug plus 6 days (Up to 101 days).
reported_events.desc: There were 8 patients who switched from dabigatran etexilate to warfarin during the study, and hence these patients are counted in the denominator of both arms. Any AEs which occurred in these patients are only presented under the treatment that the patient was taking at the time of the event.

group.title: Dabigatran Etexilate
group.description: Oral administration of 1 capsule of 150 mg (150 mg), 2 capsules of 110 mg (220 mg), or 2 capsules of 150 mg (300 mg) twice daily

group.title: Warfarin
group.description: Oral administration of Warfarin 1mg, 3mg and 5 mg according to target international normalised ratio (INR), as recommended in guidelines, and deemed appropriate by investigator

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: Any publication of the result of this trial must be consistent with the Boehringer Ingelheim publication policy. The rights of the investigator and of the sponsor with regard to publication of the results of this trial are described in the investigator contract.

clinical_results.limitations_and_caveats: This study was terminated prematurely due to safety concerns arising during conduct of the trial.
